reviews.review: Sadece Beyin

I thought this game was good, but as the credits played, I found out it was an amazing game. I will break this review into parts : Puzzles/Levels(chambers), Music, Characters
Part 1 Puzzles/Levels(chambers). The puzzles in this game are amazing and found me stumped many times, they were engaging and some of the most deep and complex puzzles I've ever  seen.
Part 2 Music, there's not that much music in this game but the song in the end credits is amazing, sung by GLaDOS
this song had me listening for hours on end
Part 3 Characters, There are 3 main characters in this game, GLaDOS, Wheatly, and Chell, while chell does not have much character development the other two do, in this game GLaDOS is sarcastic, but when things get serious near the end she get serious with it. Wheatly is very dumb and makes often mistakes, he is taunted by GLaDOS calling him a moron.
The last game took me 5 hours to complete, this one took 24, it is an engaging Masterpiece.
9 stars
This is my favurite game from now. I just can't explain how fun this game is to me. I recomend playing this game

The puzzles are quite easy to solve unlike what you might expect them to be.

Lastly, [i]say goodbye Caroline[/i] .

It was a great goodbye to series. It was very satisfying to play and see as events progressed. Plus the dialogue was well written and funny. I litterally cried at the end because it was too emotional for me (Since I played the first game. Everyone may not agree with this.). Multiplayed mod is also well designed and solid. There too many funy ways to play this game challengingly. I recommend this game to everyone.

Story was great, The puzzels were great soild 8/10

Portal 2 is my all time favorite game. It's funny, has a great story, and is just really fun overall. The puzzles arent very hard, but their are some great, challenging levels in the steam workshop, as well as others in mods such as portal stories: mel.
